member.name: F:Watch.Manager.Service.Database.Entities.Article.VectorDimensions
member.summary: Represents the fixed number of dimensions for a vector.
member.remarks: This constant defines the dimensionality of vectors used in the application. It is set to 1536, indicating that all vectors are 1536-dimensional.

member.name: F:Watch.Manager.Service.Database.Entities.Article.VectorDistanceFunction
member.summary: Represents the distance function used for vector calculations.
member.remarks: This constant specifies the use of the cosine distance function for vector distance calculations. It is intended to be used in scenarios where cosine similarity or distance is required.
